Kenneth Okonkwo (amụrụ ya na ụbọchị nke isii na Nọvemba, n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Nigeria, na-eme ihe nkiri amara maka ọrụ ya na nkiri Living in Bondage  dị ka Andy nwa Okeke
Amụrụ Okonkwo na Nsukka Enugu State

N'afọ 2013, ọ meriri nturu ugo nke African Movie Academy Award na ngosiputa puru iche nke enyere ndi kwubara ihe nkiri nke Nollywood. Na afọ 2015, ndị nhazi City People Entertainment Awards nyere ya ihe nrịba ama pụrụ iche maka ntinye aka ya na uto ntụrụndụ na Nigeria
